## UUID.createRemoteId() method

Generates a new UUID for a remote object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
createRemoteId(withLogging?: boolean): Promise<string>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

withLogging


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional. Whether to log the generated UUID to the console. Defaults to false.


</td></tr>

Promise&lt;string&gt;
